de.dfki.lt.hfc

Class AggregateRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.lt.hfc.AggregateRegistry

  • public final class AggregateRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    AggregateRegistry encapsulates code centered around the dynamic loading of classes encoding aggregates, and the creation of instances which are unknown at compile time
    Since:
    JDK 1.5
    See Also:
    AggregationalOperator, Object, Class, Constructor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AGGREGATE_PATH
      all (custom) aggregates should be put in package de.dfki.lt.hfc.aggregates
      static boolean EXIT_WHEN_REGISTRATION_FAILS
      if true, register() exits with error code 1 in case registration fails; if false, register() returns null in case registration fails
      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,AggregationalOperator> nameToAo
      the association between a class name and its singleton instance
      private TupleStore tupleStore
      will be set by the unary constructor and is accessible to every instance of an aggregational operator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
        AggregateRegistry(TupleStore tupleStore)
      the argument to AggregateRegistry() is essential, since it will be passed to the instance of the specific aggregational operator
      protected AggregateRegistry(TupleStore tupleStore, AggregateRegistry aggregateRegistry) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BindingTable evaluate(java.lang.String className, BindingTable args, java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> nameToPos, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> nameToExternalName)
      potentially constructs an instance of className by dynamically loading the corresponding class; given that instance, the apply() method of its class is called;
      BindingTable evaluate(java.lang.String className, java.lang.String packageName, BindingTable args, java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> nameToPos, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> nameToExternalName)
      this version of evaluate() distinguishes between the class name and the package path
      private AggregationalOperator register(java.lang.String className)
      generates a new aggregational operator instance for className, sets its public field tupleStore with this tupleStore, and generates an association between the class name and the specific instance of that class

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
